mil.emp3.api.utils

Class EmpGeoColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cmapi.primitives.GeoColor
      • mil.emp3.api.utils.EmpGeoColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGeoColor

    public class EmpGeoColor
extends GeoColor
    This class extends the geo notation lib GeoColor class. It provides a constructors that take color parameters. These make it cleaner to allocate a color and assign values in one declaration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmpGeoColor(double alpha, int red, int green, int blue)
      This constructor assings all the color values required.
      EmpGeoColor(int red, int green, int blue)
      This constructor assings all the color values required.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmpGeoColor

        public EmpGeoColor(double alpha,
                   int red,
                   int green,
                   int blue)
        This constructor assings all the color values required.
        Parameters:
        alpha - - a double value between 0 - 1.0
        red - - an integer value beetween 0 - 255.
        green - - an integer value beetween 0 - 255.
        blue - - an integer value beetween 0 - 255.

      • EmpGeoColor

        public EmpGeoColor(int red,
                   int green,
                   int blue)
        This constructor assings all the color values required. The alpha setting remains the default.
        Parameters:
        red - - an integer value beetween 0 - 255.
        green - - an integer value beetween 0 - 255.
        blue - - an integer value beetween 0 - 255.
